overview: Roll Over Films is proud to present Petite Pigtail Teens. A beautiful package of young honeys filling their days with school, homework and dreams of the future as grown women. Witness a small part of their day, as they get distracted from their daily duties and lessons in lustful ways! They might be shy classroom kittens, but in privacy they become carnal craving little tigresses! Ready to live everything with passion, they open their books like they open their legs, and devour knowledge like they devour cocks!
title: Petite Pigtail Teens
